meanings.definition: Having its own head or chief, as a church or diocese.
meanings.sent1: The autocephalous church made decisions independently.
meanings.sent2: The autocephalous diocese had its own leader.
meanings.sent3: The autocephalous church decided to elect a cat as their head.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was like an autocephalous queen bee in the hive.
meanings.sent5: The autocephalous church stood out like a bright star in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The autocephalous country managed its affairs without outside interference.
meanings.sent2: The tribe prided itself on being autocephalous.
meanings.sent3: The autocephalous town declared itself a separate planet.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as free and autocephalous as a wild horse.
meanings.sent5: The autocephalous community thrived like a flourishing garden.
